fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your target will be sent the gif attached
-Your target will have all their visitors be rotated and sent the attached gif as well
-Your targets visitors will visit a random player that isnâ€™t you or your target. Overrides control and redirect immunity
-Your attackers will be rotated as well, except this will only happens twice, and anyone with unstoppable attack will not be rotated when visiting you.
-If you John Willard cube someone that is attacked, you will know, and can John Willard cube an extra person the next night
-You know everyone who has been sent the John Willard Cube

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Save 3 people from an attack **OR** have everyone be John Willard Cubed at least once
